casebody.data:
177 A.3d 109 DAVID L. FELIX AND LUIS M. FELIX, PLAINTIFFS-RESPONDENTS, v. VOLKSWAGEN GROUP OF AMERICA, INC., DEFENDANT-MOVANT, AND JACK DANIELS VOLKSWAGEN, DEFENDANT. EDUARDO DEANG, PLAINTIFF, v. VOLKSWAGEN GROUP OF AMERICA, INC., DEFENDANT-MOVANT, AND JACK DANIELS VOLKSWAGEN, DEFENDANT.

M-386 September Term 2017

079897 December 8, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
